name: The Museum (Scepheo)
description:
The Museum is a game about moving blocks. Or, well, a single important block that can attach itself to other, less important, blocks. This requires quite a bit of thinking, which probably makes this a puzzle game.

Controls (these are also in the game)
  • Up / W - Move northeast
  • Left / A - Move northwest
  • Down / S - Move southwest
  • Right / D - Move southeast
  • Space - Attach or detach
  • R - Reset level
  • U - Undo
Frequently asked question

Why is the game called "The Museum"?
Because it started out as a game set in a museum. Then that game was completely scrapped and this was created in the same project file. The name just stuck around.
